reportMetadata.title: PayroScore Payroll System - Comprehensive Security Audit
reportMetadata.scope: Complete system audit including security, compliance, and functionality

executiveOverview.businessImpact: SYSTEM CANNOT BE DEPLOYED TO PRODUCTION

riskAssessment.securityRisk: CRITICAL - Multiple authorization bypasses and data exposure vulnerabilities
riskAssessment.complianceRisk: CRITICAL - Complete failure of SOC2 compliance requirements
riskAssessment.operationalRisk: CRITICAL - Core payroll functionality not implemented
riskAssessment.reputationalRisk: HIGH - System claims enterprise-grade but fails basic requirements

businessRecommendations: HALT: Do not deploy current system to production
INVEST: Significant development resources required for basic functionality
TIMELINE: Minimum 6-12 months for production readiness
EXPERTISE: Engage security consultants and enterprise developers
GOVERNANCE: Implement proper development and security processes
